## Basics

```python
print("Hello world")

1 + 2           # Out[1]: 3
print( 1 + 2 )  # 3
print( 2 - 1 )  # 1
print( 2 * 3 )  # 6
print( 4 / 2 )  # 2.0
print( 7 % 3 )  # 1
print( 4 ** 2 ) # 16

'ab' + 'cd'     # 'abcd'
```

```python
height = 1.6
weight = 60
bmi = weight / height ** 2
print( bmi )    # 23.437499999999996

type( weight )  # int
type( bmi )     # float
```

```python
word1 = "this"
word2 = 'that'
type( word1 )   # str

word3 = True
type( word3 )   # bool
```
